attributes.action: Stop insulting and ridiculing our Prophet PBUH and the Holy Quran.
attributes.additional_details:
We are confronted with a growing concern of the rise of Islamophobia and attacks, through ridicule and mockery on our beloved Prophet PBUH and the Holy Quran. By many Islamophobia is considered “not racist” because it is about a religion which has allowed a normalisation of such hatred within the UK.
I believe most non-Muslims often lack the understanding of the deep passion, love and devotion Muslims have for their Prophet PBHU and their divine book the Holy Quran.
attributes.background: I propose that ridicule and mockery targeting our beloved Prophet PBUH and divine book the Holy Quran are labelled “grossly offensive” and therefore illegal.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do, as inciting religious hatred, or discriminating are already illegal. 

If you think that a crime has been committed, you should contact the police here:

https://www.police.uk/contact/
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
